text: Sailing at the 2015 Island Games was held at St Aubin's Bay, Jersey from 28 June to 2 July. == Medal Table == == Results == {| |- | Laser Standard Rig | || 13 | || 23 | || 24 |- | Laser Radial Rig | || 30 | || 31 | || 35 |- |Team | Dominic Breen-Turner Eifion Mon Michael Thorne Benjamin Todd || 98 | Niklas Areschoug Hemming Hanses Måns Lundberg Milio Schauman || 146 | Markus Bettum Edward Blowers Harry Blowers Sophie Heritage || 146 |} == References == Category:2015 Island Games 2015
